archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.1.2b: b) information processed by each application, such as financial transaction data, sensitive physical information or personally identifiable information (e.g. race, ethnicity, political opinion, health, genetics, or trade union membership)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
